node.title: Bio cement
node.subtitle: No kiln firing, No CO2 emissions. Grown sustainable building material.
node.description: Leading innovator bioMASON® offers the lowest carbon footprint cement product in the market. Their pre-cast materials are grown employing microorganisms..

node.title: Raising awareness
node.subtitle: Mission blue ignite public support for a global network of marine protected areas.
node.description: Mission Blue inspires action to explore and protect the ocean, ignite public support for a global network of marine protected areas

node.title: Immune boost drinks
node.subtitle: An interview with healthy drink producer Iris from Live Essences.
node.description: We met with Iris an expert in the field who is wishing to share some knowledge and shed some light about how to live healthier listening to your guts.

node.title: Mosquito repellent plants
node.subtitle: Mosquito repellent plants that you can easily grow in your balcony or garden area. It’s about your health.
node.description: Mosquitoes aren’t just annoying but they spread serious diseases like malaria, dengue, yellow fever, encephalitis as well as the West Nile and Zika viruses. Mosquitoes are also responsible for heart worm in your pets specially dogs.

node.title: Bali plastic bags Ban
node.subtitle: Denpasar just introduced a new prohibition of plastic bags, Styrofoam and plastic straws in supermarkets, convenience stores and shopping centres.
node.description: Starting with the new year, Bali Denpasar area has banned the plastic bags. Tabanan regency now is set to follow up with similar initiative. The ban is expected to cover the whole island coming into effect in June 2019.

node.title: Bambu Indah
node.subtitle: A radically distinctive boutique hotel in Ubud, unique luxury experience in a lush natural environment. Dense tropical jungle and river pools.
node.description: Located an hour’s drive to the north of Bali’s capital Denpasar, Ubud is already internationally acknowledged for its visual arts and performance, as well as exceptional arts and crafts, making it one of the most important cultural and artistic centres in Indonesia.

node.title: Green walls
node.subtitle: Absorb pollution, offer cooling shade and cost much less than any other walls.
node.description: Green walls are not only visually pleasant, but naturally absorb CO2 and other pollutants thus cleaning the air.

node.title: Indonesian waste platform
node.subtitle: Hub promoting and facilitating cross-sector collaborations for solutions on the waste problems in Indonesia.
node.description: I.W.P. is a hub to connect stakeholders, share news and contribute to capacity building cross-sector collaborations for solutions on the waste problems.

node.title: Aloe vera
node.subtitle: Exceptional properties for your skin, guts and more.
node.description: Aloe Vera, a miracle plant known for its health benefits. Antiviral and antibacterial, it can improve the effectiveness of your diet.

node.title: Plastic bags
node.subtitle: Less than 1 percent of plastic bags goes into a recycle bin.
node.description: Billions of plastic bags are made each year. 100 billion are thrown away according to  Worldwatch Institute, with less than 1% ending into a recycle bin.

node.title: Maya green roof
node.subtitle: Luxury meets efficiency. Cutting energy bill and looking good in Sanur, Bali.
node.description: Designed by award-winning architect, Budiman Hendropurnomo Maya new Sanur Resort in Bali features an innovative design with a stunning rooftop garden.
